= Operation =
== Indicators ==
LED1:  Blinks during SC startup, is off otherwise.

LED2: Blinks during normal Operation at approx 10 Hz.


== Initialization ==
 # Pins are set as Inputs/Outputs
 # All Drivers/Cogs are Started
 # 

= Normal Operation =
 * Fast Loop: 1000 Hz
   * 
 * Medium Loop: 20 Hz
   * Read All Ping Sensors
   * Send $SON Message to Robot Controller
 * Slow Loop: 10 Hz
   * Toggle Run LED
   * Debugging
